org.wildfly.swarm.config.management

Class LdapConnection<T extends LdapConnection<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.config.management.LdapConnection<T>

  • public class LdapConnection<T extends LdapConnection<T>>
extends Object
    A connection factory that can be used by a security realm to access an LDAP server as a source of authentication and authorization information.
